name: Visa Checker
description: A mobile app for checking travel policies and restrictions between countries. Available on Google Play Store.

name: Visa Checker API
description: An API that converts existing travel information into API for queries.

name: Spotify Playlist
description: A web app for organising and editing spotify playlists. Create, and delete playlists as well as add and remove tracks within a playlist.

name: Spotify Playlist Backend
description: A backend for Spotify Playlist that communicates with Spotify for user authenitcation and queries.

name: Amazon Clone
description: An Amazon clone built with React and Firebase.
